thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Total System Services Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.13

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Total System Services Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.13
text:
Total System Services Inc:
* TSYS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER EARNINGS AND INCREASES 2018 OUTLOOK
* Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.77 * Q1 REVENUE $987.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $910.4 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.00 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUES (GAAP) $3,900 MILLION TO $4,000 MILLION
* SEES 2018 NET REVENUE (NON-GAAP) $3,700 MILLION TO $3,800 MILLION
* SEES 2018 DILUTED EPS (GAAP) $3.00 TO $3.10 * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS ATTRIBUTABLE TO TSYS COMMON SHAREHOLDERS $4.25 TO $4.35
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.19, REVENUE VIEW $3.75 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
